name: Save the Ocean (Mister Morris)
description:
You are a garbage cleaning vessel, and it's your job to get all the plastic out of the ocean. Line your boat up and send your hook out to collect the trash but be careful not to harm the fishes.

Controls
- Arrow keys to move left or right.
- Space bar to shoot.
- 10 levels!

Good luck!

-----------------

I am an Indie game dev currently working on a project called "Haiku, the robot", follow my social media accounts for more pixel art and game development: Instagram / Facebook
